name: STAR (YUHW)
description:
The insignificance of human beings sets off the universe depicted by the vast starry sky. However, what is daunting is not the fear and compromise brought about by insignificance; experience the loneliness and stubbornness in it, and feel the angular belief and persistence it brings. When we are confused about the past and the future, we experience the present. At night, the small town is quiet and peaceful, which brings a sense of security to the restless moonlight.

Control: Press the Space Button to Start
Please, in full screen and run
